text: Year 42 BC was either a common year starting on Monday, Tuesday or Wednesday or a leap year starting on Tuesday of the Julian calendar. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Lepidus and Plancus. ==Events== * Marcus Junius Brutus plunders the cities of Asia Minor * Gaius Cassius Longinus occupies Rhodes * Mark Antony lands with an army in Illyria * Mark Antony and Octavian Caesar fight against Caesar's assassins Marcus Junius Brutus and Cassius in the Battle of Philippi. == Births == * Tiberius, Roman emperor (d. AD 37) * Marcus Claudius Marcellus == Deaths == * Gaius Cassius Longinus, assassin of Julius Caesar * Marcus Junius Brutus, assassin of Julius Caesar * Marcus Livius Drusus, Roman nobleman * Porcia Catonis, wife of Brutus * Gaius Antonius, brother of Mark Antony *
title: 42 BC
